This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        skipStageType(failedStageTypes, env.PROFILE) && (withLabels(cambpmGetLabels(env.PROFILE)) || withDbLabels(env.DB))
          
          
            
                        skipStageType(failedStageTypes, env.PROFILE) && withLabels(cambpmGetLabels(env.PROFILE).minus('cockroachdb'))
I adjusted the cambpmGetLabels method, so that it now accepts an optional String... argument, which we can use to remove the redundant labels.
